info.name: Feedly (wide, un-pro, font, etc.)
info.description: ❖ In addition, you can use this style to change the Feedly theme ===> Feedly (dark-light) ❖ Installation 1. Click the “Customize Settings” button 2. Choose your preferred option from the drop-down menu (or select the No Change/No option, to not apply an item) 3. Click the “Install” button ❖ Update or change the style settings without reinstalling (with Stylus) 1. After installation, refresh the style page, now you will see an “Update” button 2. Change the settings 3. Click the “Update” button to apply new settings on Feedly EACH TIME, you can change the settings and apply these new settings with the “Update” button Hashtag: Perfect, Vazir, tahoma, sans-serif, Segoe UI, Roboto, San Francisco, Helvetica, Ubuntu, Upgrade, Clean, Small, Cards
